introduction.p: This control template is for <TextList/> and <BindableTextList/>. This is also used for the RibbonGalleryItemList them, which is for the list control in the dropdown menu of >BindableRibbonGalleryList/>

prop.name: TextColor
prop.p: This property defines the default color for the item text. The value will be copied to the TextColor property of all <TextListItemTemplate/> in the list control.

prop.name: CheckBulletTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <SelectableButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines the control template for the selectable button, which controls the Checked property of an item, when the View property of the list control is set to Check.
If this property is empty, the default control template for the CheckTextListItem theme will be used.

prop.name: RadioBulletTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <SelectableButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines the control template for the selectable button, which controls the Checked property of an item, when the View property of the list control is set to Radio.
If this property is empty, the default control template for the RadioTextListItem theme will be used.
